description: Hot and spicy buffalo wings are perfect for party, just follow a few simple steps in this recipe.

For the buffalo wings: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: For the marinade, mix all the ingredients in a bowl until well combined. Add the chicken wings, ensuring they are well coated in the marinade. Cover with clingfilm and chill in a fridge overnight.
Remove the wings from the fridge and place them onto a grill pan. Grill for 6-7 minutes on each side, basting with the marinade and juices as they cook.
Meanwhile, for the slaw, combine all the ingredients in a bowl and mix until well combined.
Once the chicken wings are cooked, serve straight away with the slaw and plenty of napkins.
title: Buffalo wings with apple and celeriac slaw
